comments:
When loading Eclipse I got a popup that stated that a problem had occurred 
during workspace loading. The attached log shows the problem.

I am running on a dual processor 933Mhz computer with 1GB of memory and 512MB 
allocated to Eclipse.

I am using Windows XP with service pack 1.

I am using Sun JDK 1.4.1_02

I am running on Eclipse I20030917

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.debug.core 4 4 Oct 09, 2003 11:05:39.417
!MESSAGE An error occurred attempting to expand the variable project_loc. No 
resource selected.
Problem occurs in external tool builder, moving to Ant.

Do you have external tool builders on any of your projects that rely on having 
a selection? 
Using the "project_loc" variable with an exteral tool builder will almost never 
work. 
Usually you want to set a builder to work on a specific project (irrespective 
of selection). 
This can be achieved using the resource_path variable.

Yes, I was using "project_loc" for one project. I have changed this now to 
use "resource_loc" instead. Interestingly enough this problem only shows up 
about once a week, and the actual build never fails  when run manually.

Sounds like you have good luck :-)
Marking as worksforme
